Question.Subject: How to create profile for mozila Firefox and then set it?
Question.Content:
I want to change the startup page of it and some other things also...
I want to do all this using a batch file....
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Create a New Profile in Firefox Step1 Close Firefox. Click 'File' and then 'Exit' to make sure the program is completely closed. Step2 Click 'Start' from the desktop and then 'Run.' Step3 Type 'firefox.exe -ProfileManager' (without the quotes) in the 'Open' text field. Step4 Click 'OK' to launch the Profile Manager. Step5 Click the 'Create Profile' button to begin using the profile creation wizard. Step6 Click 'Next' after reading the welcome message. Step7 Type a profile name in the space provided. Consider using something descriptive to help you remember what is saved in the profile. Step8 Click the 'Finish' button to complete the wizard.
Use Your New Profile in Firefox Step1 Open the Profile Manager following the instructions above. Step2 Browse through the list of profiles that you have created. Step3 Click the profile you want to use. Step4 Click the 'Start Firefox' button to use the selected profile.

Answer.Content:
Create a New Profile in Firefox Step1 Close Firefox. Click 'File' and then 'Exit' to make sure the program is completely closed. Step2 Click 'Start' from the desktop and then 'Run.' Step3 Type 'firefox.exe -ProfileManager' (without the quotes) in the 'Open' text field. Step4 Click 'OK' to launch the Profile Manager. Step5 Click the 'Create Profile' button to begin using the profile creation wizard. Step6 Click 'Next' after reading the welcome message. Step7 Type a profile name in the space provided. Consider using something descriptive to help you remember what is saved in the profile. Step8 Click the 'Finish' button to complete the wizard.
Use Your New Profile in Firefox Step1 Open the Profile Manager following the instructions above. Step2 Browse through the list of profiles that you have created. Step3 Click the profile you want to use. Step4 Click the 'Start Firefox' button to use the selected profile.
